member.name: D2D1_SVG_PRESERVE_ASPECT_RATIO.defer
member.summary: Sets the 'defer' portion of the preserveAspectRatio settings. This field only has an effect on an 'image' element that references another SVG document. As this is not currently supported, the field has no impact on rendering.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PRESERVE_ASPECT_RATIO.align
member.summary: Sets the align portion of the preserveAspectRatio settings.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_PRESERVE_ASPECT_RATIO.meetOrSlice
member.summary: Sets the meetOrSlice portion of the preserveAspectRatio settings.
